name: Lala & Ara: World of Colors
blurb: Educational games for the iOS & Android platforms, aimed at teaching Armenian through colors to children aged 3+.

name: Seth Pearson & Andrew Nack's iOS Games Ported to Android
blurb: Friends have asked for Android versions of the games I've made, but I don't have a device to test on. Help get my games on Google Play.

name: Buzzb. A Chromecast game for friends and family.
blurb: Chromecast is an amazing platform to consume media. With your help we want to go a step further and turn it into a £30 games console.

name: Cockatilt
blurb: Fall for this delicious gravity-based puzzle game for phones and tablets!

name: Legend of Ace - Casino Quest
blurb: The first-ever social game...made socially. Save the Queen in this match-3 puzzle meets casino game set in medieval times.

name: The Frankenstein Wars
blurb: Frankenstein's secrets raise an unstoppable army from the dead. The battle for supremacy. Interactive story (gamebook) of war & horror.

name: Fluent Panda — Forget about forgetting languages
blurb: Grow your panda as you learn with fun and interactive bite-sized lessons, and help the underprivileged learn English for free.

name: Condense- a game about collecting mass
blurb: Traverse the entire universe as an all-consuming, growing particle. Fight to survive. Available on Windows, Mac, Android, and iOS.

name: How to Make a Freaking Video Game!
blurb: Learn how to make iPhone and iPad games using Swift in Xcode. We'll take you from nowhere to making 3 complete games!

name: Learn Chinese While Having a Blast!
blurb: A fun, engaging game which builds your foreign language skills (starting with Chinese)

name: Losswords. A game of literary portions.
blurb: The most fun you've ever had with Moby Dick, Alice in Wonderland, and Pride and Prejudice.

name: The Rocky Horror Show: Touch Me Game
blurb: The Official Richard O'Brien's The Rocky Horror Show game with a tantalizing twist on the rhythm action genre for your tablet & mobile!

name: Murder & Spies - FTP Online Multiplayer Mobile Video Game!
blurb:
Murder & Spies is an upcoming mobile game for IOS and Android devices.

Find and Kill The Murderer in your group of 9 spies.

name: Wurmhole
blurb: Blast your enemies to space rubble, travel to hostile dimensions, and unlock new ships, upgrades, and lore in this space shooter app!!!

name: FUNGISAURS Mystery Box Toys & AR Mobile Game
blurb: We hope to inspire adventure, science education, and appreciation for nature through toys, games and animation.

name: Safari Central - Rewild your World
blurb: A ferociously fun game that brings you closer to wildlife and lets you get involved in its conservation.

name: Divided Pursuit: Multiplayer Boardgame RPG in App Form
blurb: A multiplayer roleplaying video/board game hybrid that combines RPG and bluff game elements with expansive quest-based story telling.

name: BGO Mobile
blurb: Blasting BGO into the mobile age!

name: "Succession" Mobile Game
blurb: A mobile videogame for learning about kings, queens, presidents and prime-ministers.

name: Hiraethia - An Anime Puzzle Adventure Game (Relaunch)
blurb: A story of adventure, mystery, and tragedy. Follow a brave group of heroes as they try to save the world.

name: Fireball: Role-playing Simplified & in Your Phone
blurb: A fantasy role-playing app bringing Game Masters and Players together to experience thrilling adventures.

name: Crow Scientist: The Real-World Bird Science App for Kids
blurb: Crow scientists John & Colleen Marzluff show kids how to observe crows in their own neighborhoods with this free, interactive app.

name: Pig Jump
blurb: A video game for mobile made by a single person. Play for free now!

name: Cluckin' Run - iOS Port
blurb: Cluckin' Run is an addictive auto-runner where you get to play as a chicken! Please help us fund porting it to iOS!

name: Paper Chaser's: A HIP-HOP RPG SIM FOR MOBILE IOS & ANDROID
blurb: Take on the Role of a Rapper & Record Label owner in this New RPG , SIM & Strategy based Game for Mobile IOS & Android !

name: Untold Atlas: Expedition Theme Romance RPG / Visual Novel
blurb: A choice-driven, expedition-themed spin on visual novels (GxB/GXG), featuring in-game group chats and an intricate romancing system!

name: Against Instinct
blurb: Unleash your primal instinct in intense multiplayer battles!

name: Fluyo: A language learning game like no other
blurb: Become fluent in a new language while having fun, playing games and meeting others.

name: The Time Trap - A Crowdfunded Crime Solving Game
blurb: Digital crime solving at it's best, with evidence, suspect interviews and the chance to be the detective. Great solo play.

name: Rocket Adventure - iOS Port
blurb: Rocket Adventure is an addictive arcade game where you destroy asteroids with a rocket! Please help me fund porting it to iOS!

name: My Pet Dog: mobile game
blurb: Abouth everything to dog care mobile game.
